titles.title: Job Training Tax Credit Act of 1995
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow employers a credit against income tax for 20 percent of the employee training expenses paid or incurred by the employer.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/21/1995--Introduced. Job Training Tax Credit Act of 1995 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a general business tax credit for 20 percent of expenses incurred by reason of the participation of an employee in any job training program funded in whole or in part with Federal funds.
